description: Try our easy to follow Beef Vitality Bowl recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bowl,High fibre,High protein,Rice,Egg free,Winter,Seafood,Low sugar,Beef,Dairy free
name: Beef Vitality Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 red chilli, deseeded and finely sliced
600g oyster blade, trimmed, sliced into to 1cm strips

recipeInstructions.text: Place oyster, soy sauce, garlic and chili in a bowl; marinate beef for 10 minutes
Whisk together the rice wine vinegar and olive oil, season with salt and pepper, set aside. Cook rice according to packet instructions and toss through one third of white wine vinaigrette.
Drain beef, reserving the marinade. Heat vegetable oil in a large wok or non-stick frying pan over high heat, cook beef and capsicum for 5 to 6 minutes turning, transfer to a plate.
Add the reserved marinade to the pan and reduce until it thickens.

To serve, scoop rice into bowls, toss the remaining vinaigrette through the carrots and peas and arrange over one half of the rice. Add the beef and capsicum to the other half. Drizzle with marinade reduction and sprinkle with green onions, to serve.
